email.subject: The Truth Revealed
email.body:
So, at last the truth of our organization has been revealed. However, this is merely one truth of a greater whole. You see, while G managed to lead you on this wild goose chase to discover the truth about Nova, he conveniently forgot one crucial thing:
Who is Mahler?
I could give you the answer, however I feel as if your trust in me and Nova as a whole has been somewhat compromised with these recent events. Therefore, I present to you your final case: Who killed George Yularen? Your final piece of evidence has been uploaded to the Case File. - H
